title: Pauses
creator_contributor_role: International Women's Year Committee, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Women in the motion picture industry

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Feminists - Australia
description: Examines the lives of three successful women who are in their forties. Joyce Nicholson, a writer and business woman, Helen Laycock, a potter and Rosie Smith who runs a craft business. Each describe their work and their experiences as a wife and mother. A useful film discussion starter about woman's role in Australian society.
